AD_HistoryCheck.synopsis: Player comments on old siege equiment in SCL

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only one session, 'AD_HistoryCheck', is present in the input. Without any additional sessions to compare or sequence against, there are no ordering constraints (i.e., predecessor or successor relationships) nor any mutual exclusiveness constraints that can be derived.

AD_HistoryCheck_0.speaker: Player
AD_HistoryCheck_0.text: Pickets, ballistas, siege engines... a little old-fashioned, too. A hundred years? More?

AD_HistoryCheck_1.speaker: Player
AD_HistoryCheck_1.text: I remember this spot. Our siege engines stood on top of those towers, once.

AD_HistoryCheck_2.speaker: Player
AD_HistoryCheck_2.text: The tools of warfare, left to rot... I remember when they were pristine. We thought victory was close at hand.
